Html:
Molten Fury is an option with a default value of 0.15 (range is 0-1 per the description next to the input field). The talent in question applies to mobs under 20% health (0.2). What does this option specify, exactly? Is it just to estimate how much of your damage is in Molten Fury range, which may not actually be 20% but possibly more like 15% due to whatever reason(s)? Can someone clarify?

Thanks in advance.
-Morg

Kavan can answer for sure, but I believe it's the % of total time where the boss is <20% hp. If raid DPS were constant, it'd be 0.2, but most likely you'll burn heroisms during this range, and plus you fire mages and warriors do more damage while in this range, so the default is 0.15. That all sound right, Kavan?
Yes it's percentage of time spent in molten fury range (i.e. below 20% boss health). Default value is 15% of total time.
